attributes.action: Stop National government cuts to the Fire and Rescue Service
attributes.additional_details: The above information was gained by attending the Leicestershire Fire and Rescue consultation at Hinckley fire station on Thursday 8th October 2015. No other plan was put forward by the deputy Fire Chief as to how to save a normal service to the public.
attributes.background: Reorganisation means fire station will close, some will be reduced to one engine some will change from part time to full time and response times will increase thus putting peoples life's in danger. firemen both full time and part time will lose their jobs.
